channel.title: Npc's saying stuff
channel.description: how do you get a npc to say the number of players online (i want to make those cheerleader things, 2 of them) (testscape).

item.title: Npc's saying stuff
item.dc:creator: @legenda legenda
item.description:
@legenda wrote:

i know how to make them say if somebody is online if u want a npc to say ‘‘ur online’’ i can do it but i dont know how to make him tell the number of player, i will try do it

add this in npchandler if u want a npc that says that u r online:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2475) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“YOURNAMEHERE”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “YOURNAMEHERE is online!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “YOURNAMEHERE is offline”;
}
}
}

i dont know how to make a npc say the number of players but i know how to add the number of player in the top of the screen when ur playing

jsut add this after }
public void NewObjects() {
}
in your client:
///////////top screen show info////////////////////////////////////
public void writePlayers() {
int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
sendFrame126("@red@Servernamehere", 6570);
sendFrame126("@red@Wild Level: @whi@"+WildyLevel, 6572);
sendFrame126("@mag@Players Online: @whi@" + players, 6664);
setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
}

hope i helped
